  • Constructor Details

    • MusicDB

      public MusicDB(String dbName)
      Parameters:
      dbName - is the name of the user, which is also the name of the db file

    • MusicDB

      public MusicDB(String dbName, Boolean fresh)
      Parameters:
      dbName - is the name of the user
      fresh - is to create a new music db instead of reading the rows of the tables in the db.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      to generate all tables in a fresh db for a new user

    • readSongs

      public List<Song> readSongs()
      Returns:
      a list of songs by reading the 'songs' table in the user's db

    • readArtists

      public List<Artist> readArtists()
      Returns:
      a list of artists by reading the 'artists' table in the user's db

    • readAlbums

      public List<Album> readAlbums()
      Returns:
      a list of albums by reading the 'albums' table in the user's db

    • readPlaylist

      public List<List<Integer>> readPlaylist()
      Returns:
      a list of lists which the inner list are the actual data of the playlists of the user and the outer list is the list to save all playlists as integers, representing the id of a song.

    • readPlaylistNames

      public List<String> readPlaylistNames()
      Returns:
      the names of the playlists

    • getNumSongs

      public int getNumSongs()

    • getArtistID

      public int getArtistID(String artistName)
      Parameters:
      artistName - is the name of the artist
      Returns:
      the id of the artist

    • writeSongsToDB

      public void writeSongsToDB(List<Song> songs)
      Parameters:
      songs - is the list of songs to be stored into the db.

    • writeArtistToDB

      public void writeArtistToDB(String artist)
      Parameters:
      artist - is the name of the artist to be stored into the db.

    • writeArtistsToDB

      public void writeArtistsToDB(List<Artist> artists)
      Parameters:
      artists - is the list of artists to be stored into the db. Currently unused.

    • writeAlbumToDB

      public void writeAlbumToDB(String album, String artist)
      Parameters:
      album - is the name of the album to be written in to the db
      artist - is the name of the artist

    • writeAlbumsToDB

      public void writeAlbumsToDB(List<Album> albums)
      Parameters:
      albums - is the list of albums to be stored into the db. Currently unused.

    • writeNewPlaylist

      public void writeNewPlaylist(Playlist playlist)
      Parameters:
      playlist - is to write a playlist into the db, which is separated into writing the name into the playlist table and creating a new table for storing the songs of the playlist
